price: Dios les ha preparado un castigo severo por el mal que cometieron.
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum ʿadhāban shadīdan innahum sāa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
